org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.keyvalue.cfg

Interface KeyValueStoreProperties

  • All Superinterfaces:
    OgmProperties
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EhcacheProperties, InfinispanProperties

    public interface KeyValueStoreProperties
extends OgmProperties
    Common properties for configuring key/value datastores such as Infinispan or Ehcache via persistence.xml or OgmConfiguration.

    Note that not all properties are supported by all datastores; refer to the documentation of the specific dialect to find out the supported configuration properties.

    This interface should not be implemented by client code, only its constants are intended to be referenced.

    Author:
    Gunnar Morling

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CACHE_MAPPING
      The configuration property for setting the cache mapping.

      • Fields inherited from interface org.hibernate.ogm.cfg.OgmProperties

        CREATE_DATABASE, DATABASE, DATASTORE_PROVIDER, GRID_DIALECT, HOST, OPTION_CONFIGURATOR, PASSWORD, PORT, USERNAME

    • Field Detail

      • CACHE_MAPPING

        static final String CACHE_MAPPING
        The configuration property for setting the cache mapping. Supported values are the CacheMappingType enum or the String representations of its constants. Defaults to CacheMappingType.CACHE_PER_TABLE.

        Note that any value specified via this property will be overridden by values configured via annotations or the programmatic API.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
